Description: Green glazed composition shabti of Pedineith with a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with a beard, crossed hands in relief holding an adze, a hoe and the cord of a seed-bag which hangs over the shoulder, the lower body and leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of The Book of The Dead in nine rows of incised Hieroglyphs; there is a back-pillar and a plinth beneath the feet.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Rev G H Fagan
